content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner mining drill (position not specified) and a stone furnace at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=117.5, y=-30.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=117.5, y=-30.5), boiler(position x=111.5, y=-32.0) and offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5)

### Transport system at position(x=63.5, y=-53.5)
Consists of transport-belt (position x=63.5, y=-53.5) and transport-belt (position x=64.5, y=-53.5)

### Inserter system at position(x=39.5, y=-79.5)
Consists of burner-inserter (position x=39.5, y=-79.5) and burner-inserter (position x=41.5, y=-78.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when entities are not fueled
- Ensure that burner mining drills and burners have fuel before starting operations.
- Ensure that boilers have fuel to generate steam for steam engines.

### Errors when entities are not connected
- Ensure that steam engines are connected to the electric network.
- Ensure that pipe-groups are not empty and have a full output.

### Errors when entities are waiting for source items
- Ensure that burner-inserters have source items to operate.

### Errors when entities have no ingredients
- Ensure that stone furnaces have ingredients to smelt.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent. 
No important variables have been assigned.
